mapper.select:
select count(*) from threescoops_mealkit where
mealkitId >0
select authorid from threescoops_author where authorName like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select * from threescoops_bcate where cateCode > 100000 and cateCode < 200000
select * from threescoops_bcate where cateCode > 200000 and cateCode < 300000

select a.mealkitID, a.mealkitNAME, a.AUTHORID, b.AUTHORNAME, a.PUBLEYEAR, a.PUBLISHER, a.CATECODE, c.CATENAME, a.mealkitPRICE, a.mealkitSTOCK, a.mealkitDISCOUNT, a.mealkitINTRO, a.mealkitCONTENTS from threescoops_mealkit a left outer join threescoops_author b on a.authorId = b.authorId left outer join threescoops_bcate c on a.catecode = c.catecode where mealkitid = ${mealkitId}
select mealkitId, mealkitName from threescoops_mealkit where mealkitId = #{mealkitId}

select * from (select rownum as rn, mealkitId, mealkitName, ratingAvg, (select cateName from threescoops_bcate where threescoops_mealkit.cateCode = threescoops_bcate.cateCode) as cateName from threescoops_mealkit order by ratingAvg desc nulls last)
where rn < 9
